# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Interconnected Pipe Replacement Services for Harrow Center and Woodslee Farm

## Title (French)
Remplacement d'une conduite principale et de dispositifs de prévention des retours d’eau polluée au Centre Harrow et la ferme Woodslee

## Tender Details
- **Contract Reference Number**: WS4688541151
- **Publication Date**: July 16, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 23, 2024
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

## Project Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking experienced contractors for a 16-week project to replace interconnected pipes and control devices at two sites: 2585 Essex County Rd 20, Harrow, Ontario, and 1367 County Road 46, Maidstone, ON. This is a two-phase tender process. The first phase involves the qualification of contractors, while the second phase requires a detailed financial bid based on the provided specifications and drawings.

## Important Notes
* The closing time for submission has been updated to August 1st, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT.
* Only complete and compliant bids submitted by the designated deadline will be considered.
* Contractors must perform the work within 16 weeks from the date of contract acceptance.

## Contact Information
For more information or to access the tender package, please refer to the [linked announcement on SAP Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20339917?extsite=MjAzMzk5MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
